content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Good afternoon Juan. Thank you for considering my apartment. I am happy to discuss the rental price with you. However, I must clarify that the apartment is quite small, only 25 square meters. It may not be suitable for your needs.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I understand, but I am very interested in the apartment. Can you tell me the rental price?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Of course, Juan. I am looking for a rental price of 800 Euros per month. This is a fair price considering the size of the apartment and its location in Mannheim.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I see. That's quite high. Can we negotiate the rental price?

I am a student and I am looking for the lowest possible rental price. Can we agree on a lower price?

I am very responsible and dependable, so I am sure I will take good care of the apartment. I hope we can come to an agreement.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content:
I understand your concerns, Juan. However, as the landlord, I am looking for the highest possible rental price. I am willing to negotiate, but I cannot agree to a lower price than the one I have proposed.

I appreciate your willingness to take care of the apartment, but my goal is to maximize my gains from renting out the space. I hope we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine
